title: Call (Method)
text:
METHOD Call
Called cyclically to process tokens from tokensIn to tokensOut.
The implementation should read the tokens in tokensIn, and append
(possibly modified) tokens to tokensOut.  The processed tokens
need to be removed from tokensIn.

rows:
Out: error position (line number, column, and length)
in case of an error.
Set all to -1 if no error position is known.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment:
All tokens have been processed and no new tokens will be appended.
Should be set if tokensIn is empty and has EndOfData set, and there
are no pending tokens due to the state of the modifier function block.
